title: Add full menu page with categorized sections

requirements.text: Create a new Menu page component that displays the complete restaurant menu organized into categorized sections (e.g., Appetizers, Main Course, Beverages, Desserts). Each menu item should include name, description, price, and image in a card layout consistent with the existing MenuHighlights component styling.

quotes: now add the full menu page with categorized sections

acceptanceCriteria: Menu page component exists with categorized sections
Each category has a clear heading and displays multiple menu items
Menu items show name, description, price, and image
Layout uses the existing gold/charcoal luxury theme
Page is responsive and maintains design consistency with Gallery and Home pages

requirements.text: Add routing to navigate to the Menu page and integrate it into the main App component using TanStack Router, following the same pattern as the existing Gallery route.

quotes: now add the full menu page with categorized sections

acceptanceCriteria: Menu route is defined in App.tsx
Menu page is accessible via /menu path

requirements.text: Update the Header component to include a navigation link to the Menu page, positioned between Home and Gallery links in the navigation bar.

quotes: now add the full menu page with categorized sections

acceptanceCriteria: Menu link appears in both desktop and mobile navigation
Link shows active state styling when on Menu page
Navigation order is Home → Menu → Gallery

requirements.text: Update the Footer component quick links section to include a link to the Menu page.
acceptanceCriteria: Menu link is added to Footer quick links section
Link navigates to the Menu page when clicked

requirements.text: Render generated menu item images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for the categorized menu items, displaying high-quality food photography for each dish across all menu categories.
acceptanceCriteria: Menu item images are rendered from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
Images are displayed for all menu items across categories
Image quality and styling are consistent with existing food images

constraints: Use TanStack Router for routing following the existing pattern in App.tsx
Maintain the luxury design theme with black, charcoal, and gold accents
Use Playfair Display for headings and Inter for body text
Follow the existing component structure and styling patterns from MenuHighlights and Gallery components
nonGoals: Backend menu data management or CRUD operations
Menu item filtering or search functionality
Dynamic menu pricing or availability updates
